articles.title: Sabeer Nelli: Building Bridges Between Worlds - From Fintech to the Future
articles.description: Some people build companies. Others build change. Sabeer Nelli, founder and CEO of Zil Money Corporation, is one of the rare few who does both — creating not just technology, but an entire ecosystem where innovation travels freely between continents. From East Texas to Kerala, from fuel stations to fintech, and from local solutions to […]

articles.description: The crucial project is being completed with new technology which officials say minimises disruption.

articles.title: MIER College conducts AI Workshops
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Oct 11: MIER College of Education (Autonomous), Jammu in collaboration with the Commonwealth of Learning (COL), Canada, successfully organised two intensive workshops on Artificial Intelligence (AI) integration in higher education. Dr. Kaushal Kumar Bhagat, Assistant Professor at the Advanced Technology Development Centre and Vice Chairman of Centre for Teaching Learning and Virtual Skilling at IIT Kharagpur was resource person for both workshops. The first workshop on ‘Institutional AI Policy for Teaching, Learning and Research’ brought together faculty […]
articles.content:
By
Daily Excelsior
-
Excelsior Correspondent
JAMMU, Oct 11: MIER College of Education (Autonomous), Jammu in collaboration with the Commonwealth of Learning (COL), Canada, successfully organised two intensive workshops on Artificial Intelligence (AI)... [985 chars]
